about_the_game:
From planting seeds to sewing stylish outfits, every day is a mix of creativity and farming fun. Run your atelier, make unique outfits using sewing patterns, and dress up customers based on their requests. Customize your character, try out different styles, and bring your fashion dreams to life. It’s time to grow your way to success!

Escape to Cottonville

A friend’s unexpected offer of a new life in Cottonville might be just what you need. Far from the noise of Friglight, a small family sewing shop is waiting for you in this peaceful town. Cottonville offers a cozy escape where you can start fresh and build your career, one stitch at a time, while letting the drama of the big city fade away.

Customize Your Character

Make your character truly yours! Choose hairstyles, eyes, skin, and more alongside the outfits that match your style. As you progress, unlock new fashion items and expand your wardrobe to reflect your journey in Cottonville.

Fashion Career Starts on the Farm

Whether you’re growing crops or crafting trendy outfits, Cottonville combines the simple joys of farm life with the excitement of fashion design. You’ll learn everything from fabric-making to fashion styling – right from the farm!

Grow and harvest essential crops like cotton, linen, and bamboo, and gather flowers for natural dyes to produce fabrics – all available in seven different colors. Buy new sewing patterns to expand your dress-up options and make even more fashionable clothes. Your farm provides everything needed to craft stylish outfits.

Run Your Atelier

Your atelier is the heart of Cottonville’s fashion world! With over 60 clothing designs and multiple color variations, you can sew, dye, and customize garments using a set collection of sewing patterns to match your customers' needs. Listen to their requests, mix and match fabrics, and create outfits that suit their personalities.

Every customer has a story, and your designs help them shine. Whether it’s a fancy dress for a festival, a warm sweater for winter, or a breezy outfit for summer, your boutique becomes the town’s go-to fashion hub.

The game includes:

  • Over 60 patterns with different color options to collect (Over 120 all)

  • 18 hair colors to choose from 15 unique hairstyles

  • Eyebrows, lashes, eyes, mouth, and skin colors – we have you covered!

  • 3 craftable crops with 7 colors to mix in your Sawing Machine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Require a dedicated graphic card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Require a dedicated graphic card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
